channel.title: Abouts on The budBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on The budBlog

item.title: This Page
item.description: No JavaScript or cookies have been used or hurt in the making of this page. This page was created and designed from scratch by budRich 2019-2020. It is a Static site generated by Hugo. The ASCII-art banners are generated from the pipe: figlet -f 3d.flf "BANNER_TEXT" | lolcat -f | ansi2html. Where 3d.flf is a figlet-font created by xero. The brick wall background, is an svg file from Hero Patterns.

item.title: Budrich
item.description: I am a default Swedish man. I have a background in mechanical engineering (CNC) and rock’n’roll lyfestyle. Currently I am mostly doing computer stuff and play Tetris (NES). I also made this, budlabs thing. I have a playlist on youtube called bra grejjer, mostly music videos I like. It is a good complement to this document when painting a picture of my identity. whateverâ„¢ || budRich February 2020

item.title: Budlabs
item.description: budlabs is the banner under which I, budRich, publish my various creations. I thought it would be a good idea to have a mock organization that’s more reliable and easier to understand then myself. It was a good idea. I had just read The Idea Factory when i named it, the name is a play on “Bell Labs".
